hero.title: Empowering Morocco's Digital Future
hero.subtitle: From AI to hardware, Rkicy Technology delivers powerful, enterprise-grade IT solutions for modern businesses across Morocco and beyond.

overview.description1: Established in 2023, Rkicy Technology combines cutting-edge innovation with deep local market knowledge to deliver tailor-made IT solutions for Moroccan and North African businesses across various sectors.
overview.description2: We specialize in enterprise-grade technologies from AI to hardware, helping organizations of all sizes navigate their digital transformation journey with solutions that address specific regional challenges and opportunities.

values.description: At Rkicy Technology, we're guided by a set of core principles that shape our approach to business and technology. These values drive our decision-making process and reflect our commitment to excellence and client success.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Our team brings years of experience in IT solutions, AI development, and enterprise hardware, ensuring exceptional results for businesses across Morocco.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay at the cutting edge of technology to offer forward-thinking solutions that address our clients' current and future digital challenges.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We build lasting relationships with our clients, becoming a true extension of their team throughout their digital transformation journey.

timeline.description: Since our founding in 2023, we've been on a mission to transform the Moroccan technology landscape. Here are some key milestones from our journey so far.

founding.title: Foundation
founding.description: Rkicy Technology was established in Rabat with a vision to bring enterprise-grade IT solutions to the Moroccan market.

firstClient.title: First Major Client
firstClient.description: Partnered with a leading financial institution to implement a comprehensive digital transformation strategy.

expansion.title: Team Expansion
expansion.description: Grew to a team of 15 certified professionals across AI, cloud infrastructure, and hardware solutions.

award.title: Industry Recognition
award.description: Received the 'Tech Innovator of the Year' award at the Morocco Digital Summit.

growth.title: Strategic Growth
growth.description: Expanded service offerings and formed key partnerships with global technology leaders.

future.title: Looking to the Future
future.description: As we continue to grow, our mission remains the same: to empower Moroccan businesses with the technology and expertise they need to compete in the global digital economy.

page.title: Our Services
page.subtitle: Comprehensive IT Solutions for Modern Enterprises

section.heading: Comprehensive IT Solutions for Modern Enterprises
section.subheading: From artificial intelligence to hardware infrastructure, we offer end-to-end technology solutions that empower Moroccan businesses to thrive in the digital era.

featured.title: AI Solutions
featured.description: Our flagship AI solutions leverage cutting-edge machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision to solve complex business challenges and unlock new opportunities for growth.
features: Intelligent data analytics and predictive modeling
Computer vision for quality control and monitoring
featured.learnMore: Learn more about our AI Solutions

ai.name: AI Solutions
ai.description: Transforming business operations with intelligent automation, data analytics, and machine learning solutions tailored for Moroccan enterprises.

enterpriseIT.name: Enterprise IT
enterpriseIT.description: Comprehensive enterprise IT infrastructure solutions that power modern businesses with scalable, secure, and efficient technology systems.

cloud.name: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Accelerate your digital transformation with our enterprise-grade cloud solutions designed for scalability, security, and performance.

cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.description: Protect your business with advanced cybersecurity solutions that safeguard your data, infrastructure, and digital assets from evolving threats.

digitalTransformation.name: Digital Transformation
digitalTransformation.description: Strategic digital transformation services that help Moroccan businesses innovate, adapt, and thrive in an increasingly digital marketplace.

hardware.name: Hardware Solutions
hardware.description: Enterprise-grade hardware solutions and infrastructure deployments customized to meet the specific needs of your organization.

1.title: Consultation
1.description: We begin with a comprehensive consultation to understand your business needs, challenges, and objectives.

2.title: Strategic Planning
2.description: Our experts develop a tailored strategy and roadmap aligned with your business goals and technology requirements.

3.title: Implementation
3.description: Our technical team delivers the solution with precision, ensuring minimal disruption to your operations.

4.title: Ongoing Support
4.description: We provide continuous monitoring, maintenance, and optimization to ensure lasting success.

custom.title: Need a Customized Solution?
custom.description: Every business is unique. Our team of experts will work with you to develop tailored technology solutions that address your specific challenges and goals.

cta.title: Ready to transform your business?
cta.description: Let's discuss how our services can help your organization thrive in the digital age.

paycov.subtitle: Revolutionary fintech platform for Morocco
paycov.shortDescription: A comprehensive payment solution bringing modern cashless transactions to Moroccan businesses and consumers.
paycov.title: Paycov
paycov.description: A revolutionary fintech platform bringing modern payments to Morocco and beyond

overview.title: Revolutionizing Payments in Morocco
overview.description1: Paycov is a comprehensive payment platform designed specifically for the Moroccan market, enabling true financial inclusion and digital payments for all. From peer-to-peer transfers to QR & NFC payments, chat-based transactions, and multi-card management, Paycov delivers a complete cashless experience.
overview.description2: Our solution bridges the gap between traditional banking systems and modern digital payments, making financial services accessible to everyone in Morocco—regardless of whether they have a bank account.

keyPoints.point1: First truly comprehensive payment platform built for Morocco
keyPoints.point2: Accessible to both banked and unbanked populations

founder.name: Mehdi Alaoui
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.quote: I founded Paycov after returning to Morocco and experiencing firsthand the challenges of digital payments here. Our mission is to make cashless transactions accessible to every Moroccan, regardless of their banking status.

featuresSection.title: Key Features
featuresSection.subtitle: Powerful features designed for the Moroccan market

p2p.title: Peer-to-peer transfers
p2p.description: Send and receive money instantly with anyone—no bank account required.

qr.title: QR & NFC payments
qr.description: Pay for taxis, groceries, shopping, and more with just your phone. No more cash—just scan a QR or tap to pay instantly and securely.

chat.title: Chat-based payments
chat.description: Request or send payments directly in your conversations—fast and intuitive.

card.title: Instant card management
card.description: Add, manage, and use multiple cards securely from any Moroccan or international bank.

security.title: Your Money, Secured
security.description: Bank-grade security and full regulatory compliance—your peace of mind comes first.

features.regulatory: Full compliance with Bank Al-Maghrib regulations

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.description: Paycov is built on a modern, scalable architecture designed for security, performance, and reliability. The system employs microservices for flexibility and uses real-time data processing to ensure instant transactions.

journey.title: The Paycov Journey
journey.subtitle: From concept to revolutionary fintech platform

nextSteps.title: What's Next for Paycov
nextSteps.description: Our roadmap for expanding Paycov's reach and capabilities

launch.title: Public Launch
launch.description: Official launch across Morocco with full feature set

expansion.title: Market Expansion
expansion.description: Expanding partnerships with merchants and service providers

international.title: International Expansion
international.description: Beginning expansion to neighboring North African countries

cta.title: Ready to experience the future of payments?
cta.description: Join thousands of Moroccans already waiting for the launch of Paycov

partners.description: We are proud partners of Zebra Technologies, and work closely with world-class brands to deliver trusted hardware and IT infrastructure across Morocco.

zebra.title: Official Zebra Technologies Partner
zebra.longDescription: As an official partner of Zebra Technologies, we provide cutting-edge enterprise hardware solutions that help businesses optimize their operations, improve efficiency, and deliver exceptional customer experiences. Our certification ensures you receive genuine products with full warranty and support.

openai.title: OpenAI Solutions Provider
openai.description: Implementing advanced AI solutions to transform businesses through automation, data analysis, and intelligent workflows.

sap.title: SAP Consulting Partner
sap.description: Expert implementation and support for SAP solutions, helping businesses streamline operations and achieve digital transformation.

projects.description: We've helped businesses across Morocco transform their operations with custom digital solutions. Here are some of our featured projects.

paycov.description: A Moroccan digital payment platform, delivering instant, secure, and interoperable transactions for individuals and businesses.

finish3.description: A minimalist task management app helping users complete their 3 daily priorities with a clean design and seamless sync.

bato.description: A Moroccan boat and yacht rental platform, delivering a secure and seamless booking experience for owners and clients.

nounours.description: A modern e-commerce store for premium plush toys and figurines, delivering a smooth shopping experience and efficient catalog management.

testimonials.label: Client Stories
testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how our solutions have transformed businesses across Morocco

quotes.mohammed: We were worried that switching to a new ERP would paralyze our operations for weeks. The Rkicy team planned the process down to the last detail: zero downtime, clear training, and regular follow-up. Three months later, our billing cycles dropped from 10 days to 6.
quotes.leila: Before Rkicy, we did manual stock counts at the end of each month, and discrepancies were common. With their Zebra solutions, inventory is now real-time. In six months, we cut stock errors by 15% and saved the equivalent of one full-time position.
quotes.omar: Our old site would crash every sales season. Rkicy rebuilt our platform with a system that can handle five times more simultaneous connections. Result: zero downtime during winter sales and +38% online revenue.
quotes.amina: Before, we spent hours compiling Excel files for our meetings. With the BI dashboards created by Rkicy, all data is centralized and updated automatically. We cut our weekly management meetings from 2h30 to under an hour.
quotes.karim: We thought AI would take months to develop. Rkicy delivered an operational predictive model in 5 weeks, able to forecast our raw material needs. We’ve already avoided two critical stock shortages.

company.description: Leading Morocco's digital transformation with enterprise-grade IT solutions, from AI to hardware. Empowering businesses across Morocco and beyond.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Rkicy Technology. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Rkicy Technology's website, products, or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.content: Rkicy Technology provides various IT solutions including AI, web development, SAP consulting, and hardware solutions. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our services at any time.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is the property of Rkicy Technology and is protected by international copyright laws.

limitation.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Rkicy Technology shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services.

governing.title: 5. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of Morocco without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Rkicy Technology collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our website or services.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and company information when you interact with our website or services.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our business and deliver services to you.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal information.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Rkicy Technology uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

what.title: 1. What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the website owners.

types.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use essential cookies necessary for the website to function, performance cookies to analyze site usage, and marketing cookies to track visitors across websites.

control.title: 3. How to Control Cookies
control.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can delete existing cookies, allow or block all cookies, or block cookies from particular websites.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Our website may use third-party services that set their own cookies, such as Google Analytics or social media sharing buttons.

updates.title: 5. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, regulation, or our business practices.

overview.title: We Respect Your Privacy
overview.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. We also share information about your site usage with our social media, advertising, and analytics partners.
overview.essentialNote: Essential cookies are always active as they are necessary for the website to function.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site, measure performance, and improve the user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant advertisements on other websites and to measure the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns.
